citations.narrative:
In the enclosure housing four red foxes, the animals have excavated the wire dig guard along the outside wall. This has
led to gaps beneath the wires which could allow an animal’s foot and leg to pass through and potentially become
entrapped or broken.
In the enclosures housing three mountain coati and one South American coati, the wire flooring is uncovered and starting
to lift up. The exposed edges of this flooring have sharp wire points that the animals can access.
Enclosures that are not kept in good repair can result in injury from entrapment or sharp points. The facility must be
constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. The housing facilities shall be
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
KATIE PRICE, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
In the enclosure housing four red foxes, the animals have excavated the wire dig guard along the outside wall. This has 
led to gaps beneath the wires which could allow an animal’s foot and leg to pass through and potentially become 
entrapped or broken.  
In the enclosures housing three mountain coati and one South American coati, the wire flooring is uncovered and starting 
to lift up. The exposed edges of this flooring have sharp wire points that the animals can access.  
Enclosures that are not kept in good repair can result in injury from entrapment or sharp points. The facility must be 
constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. The housing facilities shall be 
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATIE PRICE, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
